item.title: Error creating zfs pools using drives that belonged to a md raid array
item.description: While migrating a file server from mdadm software raid to zfs I encountered the following error while creating the pool: zpool create -f tank mirror /dev/disk/by-id/xxx /dev/disk/by-id/yyy the kernel failed to rescan the partition table: 16 cannot label 'sdb': try using parted(8) and then provide a specific slice: -1 Even if the old mdadm array was no longer being mounted (as more than one disk was missing and it was a raid5) they were still being added to md0:
